Sentencas: CexSr1-xCr0.5Mn0.5O3 (CeSCM) compounds with x = 0.25 and 0.5 have been prepared in argon.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of CexSr1-xCr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ Perovskites as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: In comparison to the non-doped manganite Ce0.25Sr0.75MnO3, synthesized in air, chromium for manganese substitution improves the stability in wet hydrogen atmosphere, characteristic of an SOFC anode.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of CexSr1-xCr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ Perovskites as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: In argon, the electrical conductivity at 900 degrees C is 32.8 and 34.9 S cm (1) for CeSCM 25 and CeSCM 50, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of CexSr1-xCr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ Perovskites as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: In wet hydrogen, it is about 1 S cm (1) at 900 degrees C for CeSCM 25 and only 0.2 S cm (1) for CeSCM 50.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of CexSr1-xCr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ Perovskites as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: The rate of hydrogen oxidation reaction has been studied by using dense cone-shaped electrodes.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of CexSr1-xCr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ Perovskites as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: Two main limiting steps are observed: the transfer of ionic species at the anode/YSZ interface at high frequency and hydrogen adsorption process at the surface of the electrode material at low frequency.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of CexSr1-xCr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ Perovskites as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC)

Sentencas: In particular, the low electrical conductivity of CeSCM 50 seems detrimental for the performance.
Titulo: Synthesis and Characterization of CexSr1-xCr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ Perovskites as Anode Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC)
